TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks 对象传递给任何事件处理程序事件。The object is passed to any event handler for the event. 属性包含要插入的数据。The property contains the data that will be inserted. 你可以使用对象以检查数据之前在数据源中执行插入操作。You can use the object to examine the data before the insert operation is executed in the data source. 然后可以验证数据、 检查的数据类中，验证错误或更改在更新之前的值。You can then validate the data, examine validation errors from the data class, or change a value before the update. 你也可以取消插入操作。You can also cancel the insert operation. 如果表示数据源的对象之前它将插入数据，引发验证异常属性包含的实例类。If the object that represents the data source throws a validation exception before it inserts the data, the property contains an instance of the class. 你可以检索通过所有验证异常属性。You can retrieve all the validation exceptions through the property. 如果不验证引发异常，属性包含`null`。If no validation exception is thrown, the property contains `null`. 如果你处理验证异常，同时不想要重新引发的异常，设置属性`true`。If you handle the validation exceptions and do not want the exception to be re-thrown, set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的处理程序事件。The following example shows a handler for the event. 从对象属性被强制转换为名为的类型`Product`。The object from the property is cast to a type named `Product`. `DateModified`属性`Product`对象设置为当前日期和时间。The `DateModified` property of the `Product` object is set to the current date and time. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting/cs/Default.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting/vb/Default.aspx.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 它通过使用来显示任意验证异常消息控件。It displays any validation exception messages by using a control. ```vb Protected Sub LinqDataSource_Inserting(ByVal sender As Object, _ ByVal e As LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs) If (e.Exception IsNot Nothing) Then For Each innerException As KeyValuePair(Of String, Exception) _ In e.Exception.InnerExceptions Label1.Text &= innerException.Key & ": " & _ innerException.Value.Message + "
" Next e.ExceptionHandled = True End If End Sub ``` ```csharp protected void LinqDataSource_Inserting(object sender, LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs e) { if (e.Exception != null) { foreach (KeyValuePair innerException in e.Exception.InnerExceptions) { Label1.Text += innerException.Key + ": " + innerException.Value.Message + "
"; } e.ExceptionHandled = true; } } ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Exception As LinqDataSourceValidationException

summary.span: 获取在执行插入操作之前验证数据时引发的异常。

span.span: Gets the exception that was thrown while the data was being validated before the insert operation.

value.span: 如果发生错误，则为该异常；否则为 。

span.span: The exception, if an error occurred; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果在执行插入操作之前，将引发验证异常，该异常存储在属性。If a validation exception is thrown before the insert operation is performed, the exception is stored in the property. 中的处理程序事件，你可以检索通过异常属性。In a handler for the event, you can retrieve the exception through the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的处理程序事件。The following example shows a handler for the event. 它通过使用来显示任意验证异常消息控件。It displays any validation exception messages by using a control. ```vb Protected Sub LinqDataSource_Inserting(ByVal sender As Object, _ ByVal e As LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs) If (e.Exception IsNot Nothing) Then For Each innerException As KeyValuePair(Of String, Exception) _ In e.Exception.InnerExceptions Label1.Text &= innerException.Key & ": " & _ innerException.Value.Message + "
" Next e.ExceptionHandled = True End If End Sub ``` ```csharp protected void LinqDataSource_Inserting(object sender, LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs e) { if (e.Exception != null) { foreach (KeyValuePair innerException in e.Exception.InnerExceptions) { Label1.Text += innerException.Key + ": " + innerException.Value.Message + "
"; } e.ExceptionHandled = true; } } ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExceptionHandled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ExceptionHandled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示异常是否已得到处理而不该再次引发。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the exception was handled and that it should not be thrown again.

value.span: 如果异常已得到处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the exception was handled; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 你可以创建事件处理程序事件以检查插入操作之前发生的验证异常。You can create event handlers for the event to examine validation exceptions that occurred before the insert operation. 如果处理异常，并且不希望它再次引发设置属性`true`。If you handle the exception and do not want it to be thrown again, set the property to `true`. 如果你未设置属性`true`，该异常将传播到调用堆栈中的下一步事件处理程序。If you do not set the property to `true`, the exception will be propagated to the next event handler in the call stack. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 它通过使用来显示任意验证异常消息控件。It displays any validation exception messages by using a control. ```vb Protected Sub LinqDataSource_Inserting(ByVal sender As Object, _ ByVal e As LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs) If (e.Exception IsNot Nothing) Then For Each innerException As KeyValuePair(Of String, Exception) _ In e.Exception.InnerExceptions Label1.Text &= innerException.Key & ": " & _ innerException.Value.Message + "
" Next e.ExceptionHandled = True End If End Sub ``` ```csharp protected void LinqDataSource_Inserting(object sender, LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs e) { if (e.Exception != null) { foreach (KeyValuePair innerException in e.Exception.InnerExceptions) { Label1.Text += innerException.Key + ": " + innerException.Value.Message + "
"; } e.ExceptionHandled = true; } } ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NewObject As Object
public: property System::Object ^ NewObject { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取包含要插入数据的对象。

span.span: Gets the object that contains the data to insert.

value.span: 包含要插入数据的对象。

span.span: An object that contains the data to insert.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含将被插入到数据源的数据。The property contains the data that will be inserted into the data source. 创建处理程序事件和检索以验证数据、 更改数据，或数据操作执行之前取消插入操作的属性。Create a handler for the event and retrieve the property in order to validate the data, change the data, or cancel the insert operation before the data operation is executed. 属性返回类型的对象。The property returns an object of type . 您可以强制转换为的类型表示的数据类的此对象。You can cast this object to the type of the class that represents the data. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的处理程序事件。The following example shows a handler for the event. 从对象属性被强制转换为名为的类型`Product`。The object from the property is cast to a type named `Product`. `DateModified`属性`Product`对象设置为当前日期和时间。The `DateModified` property of the `Product` object is set to the current date and time. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting/cs/Default.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting/vb/Default.aspx.vb#1)]
